joy.translation[0].definitions[0].note_b: Joy is used especially in literature. In everyday English, rather than say they did something with joy, people usually say that they were (really) pleased/happy/glad to do it:
Thank you for your letter. I was really pleased to get it.
joy.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: something or someone that gives you happiness and pleasure
